tips.li: The improve relations ability increases faction relations by 10, but disorients the target for a while.
The harmony chip grants the bonuses of nearly every available plushie to the colonist it is installed in. You can still use a plushie to further increase a certain bonus.
Colonists with the brony trait will appreciate having a harmony chip installed more than those without.
Colonists with the anti brony trait will detest having a harmony chip installed.
